name: Obi-Wan's Journal
Lore: 'Written by Obi-Wan Kenobi. Used by Luke to construct his lightsaber. Contained instructions on building required tools as well. Keyed to self-destruct if not opened by Luke.',
Text: 'Deploy on Luke or Obi-Wan. Your characters present armed with a unique (•) lightsaber Weapon card may not be Disarmed, once per battle may cancel a weapon destiny just drawn, and that lightsaber''s Force drain modifiers may not be canceled. Lost if about to be stolen.',
